prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered howling pose with head tilted toward lunar geometry, chibi proportions with flowing water-drop shaped head with rippling edges and construction paper layers suggesting continuous flow through layered cut-out waves with drawn depth. Hair or geometric crystalline appendages incorporating Vesica Piscis, Wave Spiral, Merkaba lattice patterns from sacred geometry symbolism. Outfit is unique: neutral grey and neutral grey angular armor-like robes with flame geometric patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for heat and energy, elaborate with shifting Fire element triangular motifs and ascending patterns and Flower of Life emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like lunar crescent with silver geometric inscriptions with ethereal spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like flickering flame wisps and ember particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor AMBRIOL's profile: 'He who continuously comforts', Aethyr LOE, Fire element, Tarot The Moon, Sephirot Yesod, Zodiac Pisces, embodying the essence: 'When AMBRIOL stands before you, turmoil hushes into a gentle lullaby storm-tossed hearts are soothed...' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered howling pose with head tilted toward lunar geometry
visual_elements.head_shape: flowing water-drop shaped head with rippling edges and construction paper layers
visual_elements.body_style: undulating form with wave-like contours, flattened with sharpie-like flow lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting continuous flow through layered cut-out waves with drawn depth

outfit.base: angular armor-like robes with flame geometric patterns
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for heat and energy
outfit.details: Fire element triangular motifs and ascending patterns
outfit.magical_essence: flickering flame wisps and ember particles

visual_elements.accessory: lunar crescent with silver geometric inscriptions
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He who continuously comforts'
profile_data.essence: When AMBRIOL stands before you, turmoil hushes into a gentle lullaby storm-tossed hearts are soothed by ember-warm dreams of solace.
profile_data.angelic_role: Angel of Dreamful Respite; guides zephyr-bound messengers.
profile_data.form_description: A mercurial, wave-like humanoid form that shifts between liquid fire and translucent mist, representing the liminal space between dream and consciousness in the LOE Aethyr
profile_data.color_reasoning: Indigo represents intuition and the lunar qualities of Pisces, while silver-blue connects to Yesod's mystical realm and the dreaming consciousness of The Moon tarot archetype
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Sacred geometries that represent transformation, dimensional transit, and the fluid boundaries between conscious states
